allSaves.value: +2 status to all saves vs. magic

details.sidebarText:
Leydroth Legacy

On Golarion, the first leydroths were created by a secret society of Azlanti sorcerers who drew their powers from elemental bloodlines. These sorcerers clashed often against various wizardly guilds who held power throughout the various regions of Azlant, and intended for leydroths to serve as weapons of terror against their foes. Today, leydroths remain isolated on certain particularly dangerous islands among the remnants of the shattered continent of Azlant, but now and then foolish explorers seek to transport them back to the mainland.
details.flavorText:
In ancient times, a cabal of primalists imbued an amalgam of beasts with both supernatural might and a hatred of magic itself, hoping to achieve a potent weapon for use against arcane spellcasters. Effective beyond expectation, the first leydroths broke free and turned on their creators. Worse, the leydroths bred true, and these reclusive predators have long outlived their original creators.

Leydroths look like distorted, apelike felines with many-branching horns growing from the backs of their heads. Their thickly muscled limbs end in glowing claws.

description.value: Crackling energy disjoins the target. You attempt to counteract it. If you succeed, it's deactivated for 1 week. On a critical success, it's destroyed. If it's an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.
description.label: Description

description.value: Crackling energy disjoins the target. You attempt to counteract it. If you succeed, it's deactivated for 1 week. On a critical success, it's destroyed. If it's an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.
description.label: Description

description.value: You unravel the magic behind a spell or effect. Attempt a counteract check against the target. If you succeed against a spell effect, you counteract it. If you succeed against a magic item, the item becomes a mundane item of its type for 10 minutes. This doesn't change the item's non-magical properties. If the target is an artifact or similar item, you automatically fail.
description.label: Description

target.value: 1 spell effect or unattended magic item
target.label: Target

description.value: The leydroth detects the source and school of each source of magic within 60 feet as an imprecise sense.
Trigger A creature within 60 feet Casts a Spell; Effect The leydroth attempts an Intimidation check to counteract the triggering spell.

The leydroth unleashes a bestial roar that reverberates within a 30-foot emanation. It rolls an Intimidation check and compares the result to the Will DC of each creature in the area, with the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize}. It also uses this result to attempt to counteract each spell or magical effect in the area, plus one item or effect on each creature in the area, with the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}. The leydroth can't use Dispelling Roar again for 1d4 rounds.

Frequency once per round; Trigger The leydroth hits a creature, object, or spell effect with a Strike; Effect The leydroth casts its innate @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}, targeting one effect on the creature struck.
Any time a leydroth counteracts a spell or item, the spell's caster or the creature holding the item takes [[/r 8d6 # mental damage]] mental damage (DC 38 basic Will save).
